  • Classes in org.tquadrat.foundation.fx.control used by org.tquadrat.foundation.fx.control
    Class
    Description
    ErrorDisplay.MessageTrigger
    Wraps a BooleanBinding with a message.
    RangeSlider
    The RangeSlider control is simply a JavaFX Slider control with support for two 'thumbs', rather than one.
    TimeSlider
    A TimeSlider is basically a RangeSlider for the input of times and durations.
    TimeSlider.Granularity
    The granularity for the TimeSlider.
